articles.title: Poor geographic accessibility associated with lower number of women getting breast cancer screening - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A new study led by researchers at the American Cancer Society shows travel time to the nearest mammography facility is long for a considerable proportion of women in the United States, particularly affecting more than 50% of women in rural areas in 28 states.

articles.title: ADA Advises New BP, Lipid Targets for People With Diabetes - Medscape
articles.description: The new 2023 American Diabetes Association Standards of Care address management of diabetes and its complications, as well as social determinants of health.
articles.content:
New more aggressive targets for blood pressure and lipids are among the changes to the annual American Diabetes Association (ADA) Standards of Care in Diabetes 2023.
